ingredients: 1 cup shredded tart apple, 1 cup milk,   +   1/4 cup butter, melted, 1 large egg, 1   +   1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon white sugar, 1   +   1/4 teaspoons baking powder,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon
nutrition: Total Fat 14g 18%, Saturated Fat 9g 43%, Cholesterol 82mg 27%, Sodium 238mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 41g 15%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 9g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 2mg 8%, Calcium 153mg 12%, Iron 2mg 12%, Potassium 188mg 4%
